mapper.select: SELECT ti.id AS ti_id,pub_id,task_state,title,reward,start_time,end_time,description,2 AS `type`, ti.gmt_create AS ti_gmt_create,ti.gmt_modified AS ti_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM task_information AS ti LEFT JOIN task_category AS c ON ti.category=c.id LEFT JOIN task_tag AS `tt` ON `tt`.task_id=ti.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_task AS t ON t.id=`tt`.tag_id WHERE ti.id=#{id}

SELECT ti.id AS ti_id,pub_id,task_state,title,reward,start_time,end_time,description,2 AS `type`, ti.gmt_create AS ti_gmt_create,ti.gmt_modified AS ti_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM task_information AS ti LEFT JOIN task_category AS c ON ti.category=c.id LEFT JOIN task_tag AS `tt` ON `tt`.task_id=ti.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_task AS t ON t.id=`tt`.tag_id WHERE category=#{info.category} AND (title LIKE "%"#{info.title}"%" OR content LIKE "%"#{tag.content}"%" OR description LIKE "%"#{info.description}"%") AND task_state=#{info.taskState} AND ti.gmt_create BETWEEN #{info.createTimeBegin} AND #{info.createTimeEnd} limit #{info.begin},#{info.size}

SELECT ti.id AS ti_id,pub_id,task_state,title,reward,start_time,end_time,description,2 AS `type`, ti.gmt_create AS ti_gmt_create,ti.gmt_modified AS ti_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM task_information AS ti LEFT JOIN task_enshrine AS te ON te.task_id=ti.id LEFT JOIN task_category AS c ON ti.category=c.id LEFT JOIN task_tag AS `tt` ON `tt`.task_id=ti.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_task AS t ON t.id=`tt`.tag_id WHERE te.user_id=#{user.id} limit #{user.begin},#{user.size}
